'''1.20.1''' is a hotfix to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on June 21, 2023, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/16921792287757-Minecraft-1-20-1-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.20.1 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 21, 2023}}</ref>
